name: Cheese Hole Factory
description:
Have you ever wondered where the holes in some cheese come from? Well here is the answer ;D Cheese Hole Factory!

You play as a worker at a cheese hole factory, making holes in different types of cheese. The names of the cheeses is real but nothing else about the cheese is so dont take it to seriously.

I would have liked to add more stuff like: Different tools, better difficulty and different enviroments. But couldnt find the time to.

Input: Mouse movement and left mouse button

Art & Music: All art is made by me in Photoshop. Font is "TravelingTypewriter". Sounds made in bfxr and audacity. Music by the amazing Evan King (https://www.evankingmusic.com/)

Feel free to leave feedback and/or your score.
